data.title: 16-Inch Halo 100% Remy Human Hair Extensions
data.meta_description: Buy 16 Inch - Halo Hair Extensions. Fast shipping in Australia.
data.text:
About Our 16” Halo Hair Extensions - Human Hair

Gain fuller, longer, thicker hair without any of the fuss of traditional hair extensions with the best Halo hair extensions available on the market. The 30-second Zala Halo hair extensions are the quickest and easiest way to take your hair from 0 to 100. The process is clip, glue, and damage free.

Product Specifications

Halo - 1 piece set

Styling Tips:

Heat resistant up to 284F/140C.

Cut and heat style the way you desire

We do not recommend bleaching your hair extensions, as this can compromise the integrity of the hair.

Care Tips:

We recommend only washing your Hair Extensions if they are holding an odour, or if they are holding product build up. Washing them too often can strip the moisture out of them. Maintaining the condition of your natural hair with good quality products is very important, as is keeping your Zala Hair Extensions in their first-day condition, by storing and maintaining them properly. Zala offers protective hanger bag and silky storage pouch to store your extensions, while they are not being worn. For the best results, store the hair extension storage case in a dark and dry location, without exposure to direct sunlight.

Colour Match:

We offer a free shade match service, so you can find your perfect match before you purchase. Simply complete this form and upload 2-3 photos that show your hair in full length, and our shade match specialists will respond with your personalised results!

Returns & Exchanges:

If for any reason you need to return or exchange your goods, you can return within 30 days from the date of purchase. Refunds are calculated as the total order amount, minus shipping incurred by ZALA. The product hygiene tag must be in-tact around the product and they must be returned in unused condition. For full policy, Visit the Customer service page.

Length Guide

12 inch

Reaches comfortably below the collarbone. Ultra natural and subtle once applied. Great for shorter customers. Perfect for adding volume or very subtle, everyday length. 12-inch clip-in hair extensions are the shortest length available at Zala. 100g of 100% human remy hair.

16 inch

16-inch clip-in hair extensions reach to the bust line. A popular length for those wanting a natural effect. Great for shorter customers. Weaves enhance hair whilst looking ultra natural. Perfect for everyday wear and work styles. 130g of 100% human remy hair.

20 inch

Long length, almost reaches to the waist. Great for any height and delivers absolute showstopping length. You can curl and still have long hair! 150g of 100% human remy hair.

24 inch

Extra long length, reaches to the waist. With 170g of 100% human remy hair, this length is perfect for any height and delivers absolute showstopping length. You can curl and still have long hair! If you love extra thickness and volume, you may prefer our 9 piece set, or our extra thick quad-weft clip-in set.

26 inch

Extra extra long length, reaches just past the waist. With 190g of 100% human remy hair, this set is great for any height and delivers that “WOW” length.

Shipping, Exchanges and Returns
